name: GitHub Repository Download
description: Downlooad specific repository from a GitHub. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
import os
import requests
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, Output

# Component Create By Fabricando Sua Ideia: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class GitHubFileLoaderComponent(Component):
    display_name = "GitHub Repository Download"
    description = "Downlooad specific repository from a GitHub."
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    icon = "github"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(name="repo", display_name="Repository Name", value="your-username/your-repository"),
        MessageTextInput(name="access_token", display_name="Access Token", value=""),
        MessageTextInput(name="github_api_url", display_name="GitHub API URL", value="https://api.github.com"),
        MessageTextInput(name="branch", display_name="Branch", value="main"),
        MessageTextInput(name="save_dir", display_name="Save Directory", value="axiestudio/Github")
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        repo = self.repo
        access_token = self.access_token
        github_api_url = self.github_api_url
        branch = self.branch
        save_dir = self.save_dir

        headers = {"Authorization": f"token {access_token}"}
        try:
            # Get the list of files in the repository
            response = requests.get(f"{github_api_url}/repos/{repo}/git/trees/{branch}?recursive=1", headers=headers)
            response.raise_for_status()
            tree = response.json().get('tree', [])

            if not os.path.exists(save_dir):
                os.makedirs(save_dir)

            for file_info in tree:
                if file_info['type'] == 'blob':
                    file_path = file_info['path']
                    file_url = f"{github_api_url}/repos/{repo}/contents/{file_path}?ref={branch}"
                    file_response = requests.get(file_url, headers=headers)
                    file_response.raise_for_status()
                    file_content = file_response.json().get('content', '')
                    
                    # Decode base64 content
                    import base64
                    file_data = base64.b64decode(file_content)
                    
                    full_path = os.path.join(save_dir, file_path)
                    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(full_path), exist_ok=True)
                    
                    with open(full_path, 'wb') as file:
                        file.write(file_data)

            data = Data(value=f"Repository saved to {save_dir}")
            self.status = data
            return data

        except requests.exceptions.HTTPError as e:
            error_message = f"HTTP error occurred: {e}"
            print(error_message)
            data = Data(value=error_message)
            self.status = data
            return data
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"An error occurred: {e}"
            print(error_message)
            data = Data(value=error_message)
            self.status = data
            return data

# Example usage
component = GitHubFileLoaderComponent()
component.repo = "your-username/your-repository"
component.access_token = "your-access-token"
component.github_api_url = "https://api.github.com"
component.branch = "main"
component.save_dir = "axiestudio/Github"

output_data = component.build_output()
print(output_data.value)

node.description: Downlooad specific repository from a GitHub.

import os
import requests
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, Output

# Component Create By Fabricando Sua Ideia: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class GitHubFileLoaderComponent(Component):
    display_name = "GitHub Repository Download"
    description = "Downlooad specific repository from a GitHub."
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    icon = "github"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(name="repo", display_name="Repository Name", value="your-username/your-repository"),
        MessageTextInput(name="access_token", display_name="Access Token", value=""),
        MessageTextInput(name="github_api_url", display_name="GitHub API URL", value="https://api.github.com"),
        MessageTextInput(name="branch", display_name="Branch", value="main"),
        MessageTextInput(name="save_dir", display_name="Save Directory", value="axiestudio/Github")
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        repo = self.repo
        access_token = self.access_token
        github_api_url = self.github_api_url
        branch = self.branch
        save_dir = self.save_dir

        headers = {"Authorization": f"token {access_token}"}
        try:
            # Get the list of files in the repository
            response = requests.get(f"{github_api_url}/repos/{repo}/git/trees/{branch}?recursive=1", headers=headers)
            response.raise_for_status()
            tree = response.json().get('tree', [])

            if not os.path.exists(save_dir):
                os.makedirs(save_dir)

            for file_info in tree:
                if file_info['type'] == 'blob':
                    file_path = file_info['path']
                    file_url = f"{github_api_url}/repos/{repo}/contents/{file_path}?ref={branch}"
                    file_response = requests.get(file_url, headers=headers)
                    file_response.raise_for_status()
                    file_content = file_response.json().get('content', '')
                    
                    # Decode base64 content
                    import base64
                    file_data = base64.b64decode(file_content)
                    
                    full_path = os.path.join(save_dir, file_path)
                    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(full_path), exist_ok=True)
                    
                    with open(full_path, 'wb') as file:
                        file.write(file_data)

            data = Data(value=f"Repository saved to {save_dir}")
            self.status = data
            return data

        except requests.exceptions.HTTPError as e:
            error_message = f"HTTP error occurred: {e}"
            print(error_message)
            data = Data(value=error_message)
            self.status = data
            return data
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"An error occurred: {e}"
            print(error_message)
            data = Data(value=error_message)
            self.status = data
            return data

# Example usage
component = GitHubFileLoaderComponent()
component.repo = "your-username/your-repository"
component.access_token = "your-access-token"
component.github_api_url = "https://api.github.com"
component.branch = "main"
component.save_dir = "axiestudio/Github"

output_data = component.build_output()
print(output_data.value)
